title: Morgan Park Shooting Wounds Boy, 16, Police Say
content:
CHICAGO — A shooting in Morgan Park left a 16-year-old boy wounded on Tuesday afternoon, police said.
At 2:32 p.m., the boy was walking in the 11400 block of South Vincennes Avenue when someone in a silver car driving by fired shots at the boy, police said.
The boy was hit in his neck and right shoulder and was taken to Advocate Christ Medical Center, where his condition was not available but he was listed as "stable," police said.
No one was in custody.
